org.apache.ignite.mesos

Class IgniteScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.mesos.IgniteScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mesos.Scheduler

    public class IgniteScheduler
extends Object
implements org.apache.mesos.Scheduler
    Ignite scheduler receives offers from Mesos and decides how many resources will be occupied.
